Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory253.png'}
{3: "Hearing Changyu's lyrics, a middle-aged man begins to take action. He slams into a Corrupted that passed by a Pulao soldier attempting to charge the crowd."}
{2: 'Middle-aged Man', 3: '～Else, wherefore would one walk the earth?～'}
{3: 'The man tries his best to pin the Corrupted down, paying no heed to the Corrupted stabbing him in the chest.'}
{3: "Another member of the crowd rushes out. She picks up a rifle from one of the dead Pulao Crew and shoves the barrel in the Corrupted's mouth, then pulls the trigger."}
{3: 'Even after emptying the clip, she is still standing there with her finger on the trigger. A Pulao soldier comes up to her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew D', 3: "That's... enough.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The high-explosive rounds have long since obliterated the Corrupted's head, leaving nothing but bullet holes deep in the ground."}
{3: "After hearing the Pulao soldier's words, she kneels down on the ground and weeps solemnly over the man's body."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew D', 3: 'He gave his life to stop a massacre...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the theater performance over, the director takes Changyu and Laoyu onto the street to help the Pulao Crew organize the crowd of people.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Calm down, everyone. There's no cause for alarm. Walk this way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "We've repelled the monster's air raid. Please hurry up and retreat in an orderly manner.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Laoyu', 3: 'Th-This way.'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: "It's all right. This is our duty as members of the KCC.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as order is gradually being restored to the crowd, a loud noise is heard nearby.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew B', 3: "Ol' Chen and Zhao, let's go and have a look. Everyone else, stay here to protect the people.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Roger!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Director, I'll go and have a look. I'm the fastest here. I should be of more use.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'But before the director could finish, Changyu disappears in a flash.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew D', 3: "He's kindhearted, but it's too dangerous. I'll bring him back.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: "Oh, thank you then... If you wouldn't mind.", 4: '1'}
